Back to Johann Sebastian Bach

Johann Sebastian Bach

Suite in G minor, BWV 995

1727–1732

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Total duration: 21' 30"

  • 1. Prelude
  • 2. Allemande
  • 3. Courante
  • 4. Sarabande
  • 5. Gavotte I – Gavotte II en Rondeau – Gavotte I
  • 6. Gigue

This suite is an arrangement for lute of the suite no. 5 for solo cello (BWV 1011). The arrangement works naturally and effectively for harpsichord (or piano).

Recommended editions

  • Neue Bach-Ausgabe (Bärenreiter) · V, 10 · BA 5044-01 · Einzeln überlieferte Klavierwerke II / Kompositionen für Lauteninstrumente · ed. Hartwig Eichberg / Thomas Kohlhase

1. Prelude

Duration: 5' 30"

Difficulty: 2

2. Allemande

Duration: 4' 30"

Difficulty: 2

3. Courante

Duration: 2' 30"

Difficulty: 2.5

4. Sarabande

Duration: 2'

Difficulty: 1

5. Gavotte I – Gavotte II en Rondeau – Gavotte I

Duration: 5'

Difficulty: 1.5

6. Gigue

Duration: 2'

Difficulty: 1.5
